children.name: Test defects
Test timeout of 90000ms exceeded.
Validate Home -> Brand breadcrumbs are shown in BIP
Validate the full-width banner present below the page title which supports images and videos
Validate the brands logos present below the full width banner
Validate under each alphabets the brand name starting with that letter is present
Validate navigation to BLP from Top Brands in homepage and breadcrumbs are shown in BLP
Account - Create Account - Validate the account Creation in Create Account Page for Guest Users
Validate Filters in L3 when clicked on the hyperlink
HP-Category Image Tiles - Verify the display and functionality of category image tiles, including image, title, and hyperlinks

My Account Order details - Item Cancellation - Verify if an item within a multiple item order has not been processed or shipped, application displays 'Cancel Item' button with the text 'Changed your mind?' within the bottom righthand corner of the item detail card.
Test timeout of 270000ms exceeded.
Verify add/edit New Address - Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping scenario
Verify Payment Method Radio Buttons - Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping section

Cart - Display Product Data - Verify application following details against every line item:- Product Name,Item number,Total price,Thumbnail image of product or product variant added to the cart- When applicable: Color, Size, Width- Pricing- Quantity- Availability- Arrives by- Remove button (when applicable)- Personalization (when applicable)- Protection plan (when applicable).
